price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߓߘߎ ߝߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߝߍߟߌ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߔߋ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
